did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Sara Gamm Collection of Miscellaneous Materials from the New York City Transit Authority, 1969-1970
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: This collection consists of collective bargaining agreements between the New York City Transit Authority and a number of employee organizations, including supervisory organizations, rules and regulations (technical operating rules as well as regulations concerning leave and vacations), and other material relative to the personnel and labor relations aspects of the Transit Authority.

controlaccess.head: Subjects:
controlaccess.subject: Local transit - Employees - New York (State) - New York.
Local transit - Management - New York (State) - New York.
Collective labor agreements - Transit workers - New York (State) - New York.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Sara Gamm Collection of Miscellaneous Materials from the New York City Transit Authority #5026. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
